name: Personal Portfolio
subtitle: A multi-page web application built using JavaScript and React.js.
description: The Personal Portfolio website is an opportunity to reach more people with my work. The portfolio encapsulates 3 years of experience in the Technology and Software field as an attempt to better understand various phases in the software development life cycle.

name: Tesla Superchargers API
subtitle: An extensive backend API for Tesla Superchargers
description: Real World Backend RESTful API that can be integrated with websites to offer details of Tesla Superchargers like location, status, kW Rating snd much more. Incorporates modern aspects of API design like Geocoding and error handling including HTTP fundamentals like Req/Res Cycle with Status Code.
note: Developed using Node,  Express & Mongoose Middleware

name: QuizUp - Web App
subtitle: Quiz App based on JavaScript and React.js
description: The QuziUp is a fun app developed to allow users to customize their own Quiz-Trivia by selecting Quiz Category, number of questions & time-limit for the quiz. This is an under-development app, with the initial released version that holds a fixed set of questions for users to play and enjoy.

name: Simple Weather App
subtitle: A weather app that displays real-time weather for selected location
description: A simple weather-app that uses OpenWeather-API to display current weather with Minimum and Maximum temperatures of the day, based on user selected location.
